# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-105">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-105">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-106">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-106">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-107">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-107">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-108">중요한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-108">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-109">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-109">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-110">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-110">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-111">중요한 정보 유형이 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-111">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-112">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-112">Data loss prevention policies</span></span>](data-loss-prevention-policies.md) 
- [<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-113">민감도 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-113">Sensitivity labels</span></span>](sensitivity-labels.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-114">보존 레이블</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-114">Retention labels</span></span>](retention.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-115">커뮤니케이션 규정 준수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-115">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-116">자동 레이블 지정 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-116">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-117">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-117">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-118">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-119">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-119">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-121">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-121">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-122">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-122">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-123">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-123">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-124">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-124">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-125">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-126">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-126">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-127">무형: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-127">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-128">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-129">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-129">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-131">정책은 300자 이내의 근접성에 있는 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색된다고 중간 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-131">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-132">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-132">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-133">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-133">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-134">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-134">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-135">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-135">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_aba_routing"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-137">Keyword_aba_routing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-137">Keyword_aba_routing</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-138">aba number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-138">aba number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-140">aba</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-140">aba</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-141">abarouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-141">abarouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-142">abaroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-142">abaroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-143">americanbankassociationrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-143">americanbankassociationrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-144">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-144">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-145">bankrouting #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-145">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-146">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-146">bankroutingnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-147">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-147">routing #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-148">라우팅 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-148">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-149">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-149">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-150">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-150">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-151">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-151">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-152">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-152">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-153">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-153">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-154">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-155">8자리 숫자(기간 유무)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-155">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-156">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-157">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-157">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-158">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-158">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-159">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-159">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-160">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-160">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-161">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-162">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-162">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-163">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-166">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-166">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-167">정규식은 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-167">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-168">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-168">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-170">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-170">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-173">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-173">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-174">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-174">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-175">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-175">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-176">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-176">documento número</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-177">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-177">documento numero</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-180">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-180">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-181">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-182">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-182">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-183">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-184">계정 번호는 6-10자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-184">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-185">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-185">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-186">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-186">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-187">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-187">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-188">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-188">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-189">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-190">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-190">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-191">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-192">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-192">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-195">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-196">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-197">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-198">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-198">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-214">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-214">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-215">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-215">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-216">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-216">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-217">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-217">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-218">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-218">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-219">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-219">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-220">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-220">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-221">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-222">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-222">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-223">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-224">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-224">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-225">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-225">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-227">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-227">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-228">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-229">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-230">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-231">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-231">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-232">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-232">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-233">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-233">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-234">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-234">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-235">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-235">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-236">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-236">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-237">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-237">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-238">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-239">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-239">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-249">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-249">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-250">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-250">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-252">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-252">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-253">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-253">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-254">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-254">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-255">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-255">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-256">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-257">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-257">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-259">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-259">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-260">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-260">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-261">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-261">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-262">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-263">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-264">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-264">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-265">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-266">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-266">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-267">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-268">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-268">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-269">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-269">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-270">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-270">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-271">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-271">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-272">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-272">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-282">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-282">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-283">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-284">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-284">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-285">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-286">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-286">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-287">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-287">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-288">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-288">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-289">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-289">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-290">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-290">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-291">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-291">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-292">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-292">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-293">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-293">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-294">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-294">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-295">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-296">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-296">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-297">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-298">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-299">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-299">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-300">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-300">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-301">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-301">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-401">오스트레일리아 의료 계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-401">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-402">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-403">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-403">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-405">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-405">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-406">첫 번째 숫자가 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-406">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-407">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-407">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-408">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-408">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-409">11자리 숫자(선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-409">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-410">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-411">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-411">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-413">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-413">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-414">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-414">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-415">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-415">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-416">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-416">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-417">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-417">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-428">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-428">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-429">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-430">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-430">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-431">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-432">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-432">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-433">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-434">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-434">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-435">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-436">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-437">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-437">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-438">검색된 Keyword_passport Keyword_australia_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-438">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-472">호주 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-472">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-473">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-474">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-474">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-475">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-476">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-476">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-477">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-477">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-478">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-478">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-479">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-480">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-481">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-481">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-482">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-483">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-483">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-484">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-485">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-486">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-486">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-487">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-487">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-488">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-488">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-493">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-493">medicare levy</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-500">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-500">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-501">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-502">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-502">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-503">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-503">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-504">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-504">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-505">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-506">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-506">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-508">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-508">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-509">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-509">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-510">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-510">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-637">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-637">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-638">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-639">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-640">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-641">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-642">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-643">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-645">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-645">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-647">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-647">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-648">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-648">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-649">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-649">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-650">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-651">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-651">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-653">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-653">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-654">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-654">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-655">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-655">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-656">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-656">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-657">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-657">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-658">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-658">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-661">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-661">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-662">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-663">한 문자와 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-663">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-665">한 문자, 7자리 숫자 및 하나의 공백의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-665">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-666">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-666">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-667">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-667">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-668">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-668">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-669">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-670">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-670">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-672">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-673">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-673">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-674">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-674">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-675">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-675">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-676">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-676">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-677">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-677">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-678">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-678">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-699">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-699">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-700">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-701">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-701">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-702">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-703">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-703">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-704">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-704">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-705">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-705">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-706">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-706">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-707">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-707">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-708">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-708">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-709">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-709">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-710">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 높습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-710">A DLP policy is has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-711">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-711">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-712">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-712">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-713">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-713">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-714">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-714">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-724">krankenkassennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-724">krankenkassennummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-726">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-726">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-727">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-727">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-728">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-728">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-729">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-729">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-730">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-730">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-731">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-731">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-732">sozialversicherungsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-732">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-733">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-733">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-734">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-734">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-735">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-735">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-736">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-736">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-737">versicherungscode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-737">versicherungscode</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-740">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-740">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-741">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-742">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-742">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-744">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-745">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-745">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-746">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-746">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-747">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-747">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-748">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-748">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-749">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-749">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-750">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-753">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-753">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-754">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-754">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-755">키워드가  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-755">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-756">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-756">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-757">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-757">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-780">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-780">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-781">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-781">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-782">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-782">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-783">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-783">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-784">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-784">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-785">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-785">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-786">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-786">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-787">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-788">11자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-788">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-789">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-790">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-791">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-791">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-792">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-792">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-793">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-793">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-794">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-794">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-795">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-795">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-796">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-796">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-797">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-797">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-798">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-798">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-799">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-799">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-800">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-800">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-801">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-802">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-804">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-805">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-805">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-806">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-806">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-807">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-808">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-808">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
