## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-826">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-826">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-827">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-828">문자열 "DocumentDb", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-828">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-829">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-829">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-830">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-830">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-831">3-200자 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-831">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-832">기호(>), 등호(=), 큰 물음표(") 또는 아포스트로피(')입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-832">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-833">소문자 또는 대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-833">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-834">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-834">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-835">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-836">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-837">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-838">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-838">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-839">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-839">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-840">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-840">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-841">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-841">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-842">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-842">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-843">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-843">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-844">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-844">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-845">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-845">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-846">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-846">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-847">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-847">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-848">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-848">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-849">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-849">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-850">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-850">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-851">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-851">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-852">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-852">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-853">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-853">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-854">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-854">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-855">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-855">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-856">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-857">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 및 그 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-857">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-858">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-858">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-859">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-859">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-860">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-860">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-861">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-862">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-862">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-863">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-863">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-864">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-864">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-865">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-866">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-866">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-867">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-867">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-868">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-868">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-869">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-869">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-870">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-870">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-871">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-871">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-872">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-872">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-873">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-873">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-874">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-874">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-875">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-876">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-876">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-877">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-877">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-878">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-879">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-879">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-880">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-881">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-881">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-882">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-882">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-883">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-883">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-884">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-884">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-885">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-885">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-886">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-886">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-887">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-887">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-888">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-888">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-889">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-889">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-890">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-890">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-891">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-891">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-892">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-892">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-893">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-893">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-894">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-894">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-895">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-895">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-896">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-896">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-897">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-897">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-898">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-898">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-899">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-900">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("azure-devices" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-900">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-901">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-901">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-902">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-903">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-903">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-904">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-905">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-905">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-906">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-907">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-907">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-908">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-908">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-909">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-909">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-910">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-910">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-911">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-911">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-912">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-912">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-913">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-913">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-914">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-914">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-915">소문자 또는 대문자 43자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-915">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-916">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-916">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-917">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-920">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-920">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-921">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-921">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-922">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-922">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-924">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-924">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-925">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-925">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-926">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-926">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-927">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-927">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-928">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-928">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-929">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-929">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-930">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-930">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-931">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-931">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-932">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-932">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-933">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-933">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-934">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-934">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-935">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-935">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-936">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-936">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-937">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-937">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-938">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-939">"userpwd=" 문자열 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-939">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-941">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-941">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-942">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-942">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-943">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-943">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-944">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-947">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-948">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-949">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-949">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-950">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-950">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-951">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-951">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-964">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-964">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-965">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-966">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-966">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-967">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-967">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-968">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-969">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-969">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-970">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-970">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-971">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-971">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-972">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-972">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-973">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-973">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-974">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-974">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-975">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-975">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-976">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-976">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-977">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-977">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-978">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-979">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-980">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-981">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-982">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-982">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-983">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-983">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-985">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-985">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-991">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-991">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-996">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-996">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-997">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-997">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-998">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-998">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-999">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1000">문자열 "sig", 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자 및 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1000">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1001">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1001">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1002">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1002">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1003">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1003">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1004">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1004">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1005">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1006">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 모든 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1006">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1007">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1007">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1008">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1008">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1009">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1010">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1010">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1011">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1012">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1012">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1013">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1013">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1014">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1014">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1016">문자열 "EndPoint" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열("servicebus.windows" 문자열 포함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1016">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1017">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1017">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1018">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1018">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1019">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1019">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1020">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1020">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1021">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1021">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1022">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1022">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1023">1에서 200 사이의 소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1023">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1024">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1024">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1025">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1025">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1026">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1026">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1027">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1027">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1028">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1028">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1029">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1029">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1030">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1030">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1031">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1031">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1032">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1032">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1033">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1034">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1034">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1035">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1036">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1036">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1037">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1037">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1038">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1038">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1041">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1041">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1042">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1042">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1044">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1044">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1045">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1045">sandbox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1053">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1053">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1054">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1055">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열 다음에 문자열 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1055">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1056">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1057">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1057">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1058">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1059">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1060">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1061">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1062">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1062">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1063">0에서 두 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1063">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1064">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1064">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1065">0에서 2개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1066">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1066">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1067">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1067">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1068">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1069">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1070">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1071">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1072">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1072">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1073">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾지 못합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1073">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1074">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1074">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1075">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1075">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1076">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1076">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1077">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1077">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1078">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1078">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1080">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1080">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1081">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1081">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1084">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1084">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1085">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1085">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1087">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1087">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1090">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1090">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1091">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1091">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1092">Azure 저장소 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1092">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1093">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1094">아래 패턴에 설명된 86자 이하 또는 대문자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1094">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1095">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1095">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1096">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따오기 기호(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1096">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1097">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1097">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1098">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1098">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1099">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1100">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1100">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1102">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1102">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1103">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1103">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1104">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1104">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1105">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1106">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1106">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1107">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1108">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1108">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1109">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1110">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1111">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1112">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1113">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1113">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1114">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1114">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1247">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1247">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1248">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1249">11자리 숫자와 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1249">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1251">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1251">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1252">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 두 개의 선택적 기간 MM.DD 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1252">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1253">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1253">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1254">3개의 일차 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1254">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1255">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 디지타이터</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1256">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1256">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1257">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1258">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1258">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1259">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1260">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1260">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1261">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1261">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1262">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1262">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1263">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1263">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1264">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1264">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1265">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1265">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1266">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1266">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1325">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1325">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1326">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1327">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 문자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1327">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1328">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1329">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1329">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1330">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1331">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1331">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1332">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1332">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1333">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1334">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1334">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1335">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1335">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1336">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 찾거나 찾을 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1336">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1337">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1338">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1338">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1339">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1339">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1363">벨기에 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1363">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1364">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1364">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1365">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1365">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1366">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1366">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1367">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1367">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1368">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1368">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1369">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1369">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1370">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1371">12자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1371">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1372">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1373">12자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1374">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1374">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1375">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1375">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1376">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1376">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1377">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1377">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1378">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1378">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1379">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1379">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1380">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1381">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1381">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1382">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1383">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1383">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1384">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1385">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1385">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1386">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1386">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1387">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1387">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1388">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1389">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1389">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1390">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1391">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1391">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1392">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1392">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1393">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1393">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1394">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1394">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1395">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1395">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1396">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1396">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1397">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1397">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1398">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1398">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1399">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1399">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1400">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1400">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1401">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1401">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1402">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1403">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1403">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1405">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1405">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1406">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1406">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1407">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1407">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1408">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1409">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1410">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1411">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1411">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1412">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1412">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1413">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1413">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1414">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1414">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1415">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1416">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1418">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1419">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1419">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1420">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1420">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1421">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1421">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1422">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1422">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1423">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1423">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1424">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1424">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1426">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1426">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1427">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1427">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1429">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1429">Registration</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1431">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1431">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1432">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1432">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1433">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1433">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1434">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1434">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1435">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1435">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1436">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1436">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1437">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1438">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1438">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1440">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1440">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1441">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1441">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1442">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1442">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1443">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1443">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1444">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1445">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1445">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1446">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1446">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1447">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1447">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1448">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1448">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1449">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1449">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1450">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1451">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1451">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1453">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1453">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1454">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1454">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1455">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1455">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1456">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1456">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1457">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1457">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1458">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1458">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1459">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1459">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1460">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1460">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1461">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1461">Keyword_brazil_cnpj</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1462">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1462">CNPJ</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1465">National Registry of Legal Entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1465">National Registry of Legal Entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1466">Taxpayers Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1466">Taxpayers Registry</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1467">Legal entity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1467">Legal entity</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1468">Legal entities</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1468">Legal entities</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1469">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1469">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1470">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1470">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1471">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1471">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1472">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1472">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1473">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1473">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1474">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1474">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1475">CGC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1475">CGC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1477">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1477">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span>
