## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1481">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1481">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1482">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1482">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1483">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1483">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1484">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1484">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1486">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1486">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1487">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1487">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1488">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1488">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1489">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1489">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1490">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1491">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1492">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1492">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1493">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1493">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1494">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1494">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1495">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1495">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1496">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1496">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1497">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1497">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1498">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1498">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1499">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1499">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1500">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1500">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1501">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1501">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1502">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1502">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1503">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1503">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1504">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1504">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1505">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1506">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1506">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1507">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1508">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1508">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1509">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1509">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1510">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1510">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1511">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1511">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1512">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1512">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1513">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1513">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1514">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1514">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1515">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1515">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1516">RG(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1516">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1517">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1517">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1518">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1518">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1519">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1520">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1520">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1521">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1522">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1522">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1523">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1524">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1524">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1525">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1526">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1527">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1527">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1528">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1528">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1655">불가리아 uniform의 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1655">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1656">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1656">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1657">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1657">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1658">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1658">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1659">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1659">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1660">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1660">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1661">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1661">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1662">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1663">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1663">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1665">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1665">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1666">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1666">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1667">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1667">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1668">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 1자리 숫자와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1668">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1669">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1669">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1670">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1671">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1673">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1673">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1674">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1674">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1675">키워드가  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1675">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1676">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1676">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1677">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1677">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1722">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1722">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1723">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1724">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1724">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1726">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1726">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1727">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1728">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1730">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1731">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1731">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1732">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1733">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1734">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1735">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1735">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1736">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1737">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1746">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1746">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1747">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1747">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1748">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1748">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1749">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1749">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1750">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1750">номер на паспорта</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1754">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1754">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1755">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1755">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1756">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1756">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1757">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1758">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1758">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1760">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1760">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1761">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1761">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1762">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1762">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1763">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1763">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1764">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1764">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1765">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1765">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1766">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1766">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1767">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1770">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1770">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1771">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1771">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1772">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1772">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1773">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1773">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1774">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1774">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1775">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1775">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1776">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1776">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1800">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1800">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1801">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1802">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1802">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1803">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1804">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1804">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1805">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1808">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1808">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1809">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1809">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1810">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1810">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1811">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1811">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1947">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1947">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1948">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1949">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1949">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1950">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1951">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1951">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1952">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1952">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1953">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1953">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1954">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1954">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1955">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1955">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1956">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1956">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1957">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1957">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1958">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1958">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1959">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1959">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1960">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1960">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1961">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1961">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1962">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1962">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1963">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1963">speciality services</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1966">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1966">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1967">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1967">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1969">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1969">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1970">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1971">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1971">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1972">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1973">대문자 2개와 숫자 6자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1973">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1974">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1975">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1975">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1976">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1977">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1977">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1978">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1978">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-1979">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number 키워드가 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-1979">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2009">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2009">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2010">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2011">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2011">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2012">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2013">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2013">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2014">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2014">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2015">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2015">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2016">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2016">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2017">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2017">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2018">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2018">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2019">검색된 키워드 또는 Keyword_canada_phin 키워드가 Keyword_canada_provinces 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2019">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2020">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2020">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2052">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2052">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2053">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2054">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2054">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2055">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2056">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2056">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2057">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2057">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2058">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2058">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2059">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2059">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2060">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2060">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2061">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2061">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2062">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2062">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2063">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2064">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2064">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2065">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2066">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2066">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2067">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2067">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2068">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2068">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2069">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2069">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2070">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2070">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2071">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2071">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2072">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2072">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2073">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2073">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2074">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2074">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2075">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2075">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2076">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2076">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2101">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2101">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2102">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2102">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2103">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 세분화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2103">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2104">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2104">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2105">7-8자리 숫자와 디지타이터:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2105">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2106">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2106">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2107">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2107">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2108">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2108">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2109">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2109">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2110">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2110">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2111">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2111">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2112">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2112">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2113">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2114">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2115">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2116">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2117">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2117">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2118">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2118">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2119">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2119">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2120">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2120">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2121">이 Func_chile_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2121">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2122">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2123">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2123">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2124">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2124">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2125">cédula de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2125">cédula de identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2126">identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2126">identificación</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2127">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2127">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2128">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2128">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2129">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2129">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2130">número de identificación nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2130">número de identificación nacional</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2131">rol único nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2131">rol único nacional</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2132">rol único tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2132">rol único tributario</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2133">RUN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2133">RUN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2134">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2134">RUT</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2135">tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2135">tarjeta de identificación</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2159">중국 상주 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2159">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2160">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2161">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2161">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2162">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2163">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2163">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2164">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2164">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2165">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2165">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2166">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2166">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2167">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2167">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2168">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2169">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2169">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2170">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2171">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2172">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2172">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2173">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2173">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2174">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2174">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2175">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2176">이 Func_china_resident_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2176">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2177">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2177">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2178">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2178">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2179">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2179">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2180">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2180">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2181">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2181">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2182">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2182">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2183">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2183">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2184">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2184">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2185">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2185">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2186">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2186">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2187">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2187">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2188">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2188">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2189">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2189">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2190">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2190">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2191">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2192">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddd) 및 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2192">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2194">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2194">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2195">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2196">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2196">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2198">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2198">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2199">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2199">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2200">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2200">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2201">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2201">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2202">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2202">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2203">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2203">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2204">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2205">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2205">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2206">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2206">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2207">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2467">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2467">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2468">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2468">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2469">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2469">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2470">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2470">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2471">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2471">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2472">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2473">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2473">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2474">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2475">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2476">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2476">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2477">키워드가 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2477">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2601">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2601">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2602">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2602">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2603">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2604">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2604">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2606">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2606">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2607">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2610">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2611">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2611">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2612">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2612">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2617">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2617">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2643">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2643">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2645">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2645">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2647">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2647">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2648">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2649">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2649">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2650">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2651">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2651">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2652">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2653">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2654">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2654">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2656">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2656">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2657">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2657">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2675">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2675">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2676">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2677">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2678">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2679">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2679">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2680">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2680">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2681">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2681">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2682">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2683">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2685">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2686">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2687">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2687">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2688">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2689">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2690">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2690">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2691">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2691">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2722">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2722">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2723">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2724">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2724">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2726">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2726">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2727">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2728">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2730">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2731">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2731">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2732">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2732">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
