- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2854">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2854">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2855">αριθμό άδειας οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2855">αριθμό άδειας οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2856">άδειες οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2856">άδειες οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2857">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2857">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2858">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2859">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2860">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2860">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2861">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2861">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2862">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2863">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2864">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2865">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2865">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2867">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2867">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2868">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2868">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2869">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2869">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2870">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2870">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2871">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2872">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2872">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2873">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2873">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2874">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2874">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2875">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2875">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2876">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2876">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2877">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2877">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2878">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2878">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2879">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2879">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2880">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2880">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2881">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2881">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2882">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2882">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2883">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2883">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2884">1개 문자와 공백 또는분리자 없는 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2884">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2885">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2885">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2886">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2886">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2887">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2887">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2888">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2888">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2889">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2889">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2890">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2890">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2891">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2891">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2892">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2892">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2893">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2893">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2894">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2894">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2895">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2895">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2896">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2896">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2897">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2897">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2909">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2909">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2916">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2916">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2925">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2925">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2926">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2926">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2927">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2927">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2928">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2928">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2929">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2929">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2930">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2930">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2931">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2931">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2932">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2933">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2933">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2935">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2935">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2936">a "0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2936">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2937">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2937">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2938">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2938">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2939">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2940">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2940">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2942">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2942">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2943">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2943">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2944">키워드가  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2944">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2945">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2946">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2946">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2974">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2974">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2975">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2976">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2976">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2977">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2978">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2978">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2979">문자 'E'(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2979">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2980">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2980">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2981">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2981">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2982">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2982">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2983">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2984">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2986">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2987">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2987">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-2988">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-2988">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3114">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3114">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3115">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3116">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3116">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3118">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3118">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3119">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3120">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3122">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3123">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3123">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3124">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3125">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3126">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3127">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3127">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3128">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3150">체코어 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3150">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3151">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3152">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식) 10자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3152">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3153">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3154">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3154">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3155">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3155">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3156">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3156">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3157">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3157">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3158">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3158">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3159">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3159">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3160">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3160">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3161">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3161">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3162">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3162">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3163">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3163">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3164">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3164">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3165">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3165">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3166">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3166">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3167">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3167">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3168">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3168">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3169">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3169">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3170">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3170">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3171">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3171">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3218">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3218">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3219">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3219">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3220">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3220">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3221">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3221">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3222">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3222">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3223">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3224">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3224">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3225">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3226">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3227">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3227">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3228">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3352">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3352">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3353">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3354">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3354">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3356">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3356">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3357">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3358">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3359">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3361">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3361">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3362">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3363">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3363">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3364">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3364">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3365">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3365">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3366">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3366">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3386">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3386">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3387">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3388">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3388">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3390">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3390">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3391">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3391">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3392">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3392">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3393">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3393">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3394">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3395">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3395">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3396">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3397">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3398">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3398">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3399">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3399">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3400">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3400">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3401">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3402">정규식은 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3402">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3403">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3403">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3475">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3475">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3476">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3477">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3477">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3478">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3479">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3479">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3480">가능한 문자 집합에서 대/소문자를 구분하지 않는 한 문자, 즉 등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3480">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3481">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록자 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3481">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3482">7자리 숫자, 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3482">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3483">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3484">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3484">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3485">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3486">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3487">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3487">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3488">키워드가 `Keyword_dea_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3488">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3489">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3489">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3490">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3491">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3491">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3492">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3492">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3493">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3493">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3494">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3494">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3495">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3495">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3496">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3496">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3497">약 시행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3497">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3498">약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3498">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3499">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3499">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3500">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3501">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3501">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3502">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3503">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3503">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3504">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3504">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3505">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3505">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3506">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3507">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3507">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3508">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3509">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3510">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3510">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3511">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3511">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3637">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3637">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3638">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3639">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3640">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3641">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3642">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3643">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3644">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3645">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3645">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3647">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3647">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3648">생년월일과 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1~2세대, 1-2세대, 3-4: 20세기, 5-6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3648">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3649">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3649">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3650">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3650">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3651">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3651">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3652">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3653">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3653">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3655">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3656">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3656">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3657">키워드가  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3657">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3658">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3658">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3659">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3659">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3692">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3692">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3693">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3694">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3694">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3696">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3696">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3697">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3698">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3700">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3701">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3701">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3702">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3703">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3704">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3705">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3705">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3706">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3707">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3707">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3711">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3711">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3712">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3712">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3715">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3715">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3716">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3716">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3717">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3717">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3718">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3718">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3719">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3719">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3720">eesti kodaniku passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3720">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3721">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3721">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3722">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3722">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3723">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3723">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3724">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3724">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3725">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3726">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3726">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3727">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3728">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3728">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3729">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3730">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3730">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3732">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3732">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3733">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3733">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3734">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3734">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3735">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3735">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3736">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3736">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3737">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3737">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3738">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3738">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3739">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3739">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-3740">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-3740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4186">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4186">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4187">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4188">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4188">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4189">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4190">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4190">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4191">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4191">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4192">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4192">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4193">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4193">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4194">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4194">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4195">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4196">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4196">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4198">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4198">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4199">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4199">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4200">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4200">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4335">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4336">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4337">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4338">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4339">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4339">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4341">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4341">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4342">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4342">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4343">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4343">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4344">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4344">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4345">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4345">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4346">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4346">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4347">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4347">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4348">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4348">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4349">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4349">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4350">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4350">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4351">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4351">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4352">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4352">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4353">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4353">ehic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4354">ehic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4354">ehic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4355">finlandehicnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4355">finlandehicnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4356">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4356">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4357">health card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4357">health card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4358">health insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4358">health insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4359">health insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4359">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4360">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4360">hälsokort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4361">sairaanhoitokortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4361">sairaanhoitokortin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4362">sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4362">sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4363">sairausvakuutusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4363">sairausvakuutusnumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4364">sjukförsäkring nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4364">sjukförsäkring nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4365">sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4365">sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4366">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4366">suomen sairausvakuutuskortti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4367">terveyskortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4367">terveyskortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4368">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4368">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4369">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4370">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 더한 세 자리 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4370">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4372">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4372">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4373">생년월일 형식 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4373">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4374">century marker('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4374">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4375">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4375">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4376">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4376">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4377">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4378">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4378">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4379">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4380">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4380">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4381">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4381">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4382">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4382">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4383">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4383">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4384">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4384">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4385">해당 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 함수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4385">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4386">체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4386">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4435">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4435">Finland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4436">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4436">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4437">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4437">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4438">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4438">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4439">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4439">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4440">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4440">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4441">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4441">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4442">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4443">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4444">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4445">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4446">정규식은 Regex_finland_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4446">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4447">검색된 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common Keyword_finland_passport_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4447">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4468">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4468">France driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4469">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4470">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4470">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4472">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4472">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4473">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4474">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4474">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4475">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4476">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4476">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4477">이 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4477">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4478">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4478">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
