## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4605">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4605">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4606">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4606">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4607">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4607">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4608">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4608">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4609">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4609">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4610">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4610">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4611">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4611">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4612">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4613">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4613">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4614">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4615">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4615">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4616">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4616">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4617">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4617">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4618">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4618">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4619">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4619">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4620">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4620">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4621">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4622">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4622">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4624">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4624">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4625">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4625">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4626">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4626">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4627">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4627">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4628">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4628">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4629">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4629">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4630">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4630">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4631">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4631">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4632">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4632">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4633">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4634">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4634">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4635">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4636">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4636">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4637">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4638">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4640">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4640">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4641">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4641">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4642">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4642">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4643">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4643">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4644">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4644">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4645">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4645">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4647">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4647">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4648">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4648">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4649">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4649">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4650">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4650">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4651">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4651">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4652">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4652">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4653">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4653">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4654">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4654">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4655">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4655">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4656">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4656">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4657">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4657">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4658">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4659">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4659">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4661">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4661">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4662">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4662">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4663">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4663">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4664">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4664">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4665">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4666">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4666">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4667">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4668">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4668">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4669">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4669">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4670">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4670">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4671">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4671">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4672">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4672">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4673">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4673">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4674">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4674">Passport No</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4691">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4691">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4692">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 사회 보장 번호 및 동등한 ID 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4692">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4693">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4694">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4694">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4696">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4696">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4697">13자리 숫자와 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4697">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4698">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4698">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4699">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4699">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4700">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4701">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4701">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4702">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4703">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4704">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4704">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4705">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4705">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4706">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4706">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4707">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4708">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4708">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4709">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4709">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4710">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4736">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4736">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4737">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4738">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4738">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4739">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4740">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4740">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4741">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4741">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4742">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4742">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4743">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4743">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4744">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4744">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4745">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4745">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4746">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4746">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4747">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4747">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4748">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4748">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4749">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4749">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4750">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4750">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4751">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4751">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4752">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4752">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4753">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4753">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4754">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4754">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4755">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4755">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4756">키워드가  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4756">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4757">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4758">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4758">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4760">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4760">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4765">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4765">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4771">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4771">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4772">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4772">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4773">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4773">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4774">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4774">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4775">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4775">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4776">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4776">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4777">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4777">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4778">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4778">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4779">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4779">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4780">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4780">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4781">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4781">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4782">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4782">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4783">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4783">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4784">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4784">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4785">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4786">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4786">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4788">13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4788">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4789">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4789">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4790">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4790">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4791">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4791">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4792">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4792">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4793">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4793">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4794">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4794">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4795">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4795">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4796">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4796">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4797">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4797">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4798">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4799">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4800">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4801">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4801">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4802">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4802">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4803">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4803">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4804">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4804">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4805">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4805">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4806">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4806">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4808">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4808">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4810">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4810">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4811">부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4811">value added tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4813">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4813">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4818">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4818">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4819">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4820">11자리 숫자 및 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4822">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4823">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4824">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4825">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4826">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4827">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4828">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4831">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4831">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4832">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4833">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4833">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4834">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4834">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4983">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4983">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4984">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4984">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4985">2010년 11월 1일 이후: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4985">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4986">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4986">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4988">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4988">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4989">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4989">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4990">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4990">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4991">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4991">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4992">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4992">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4993">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4994">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4994">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4995">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4996">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4996">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4997">정규식은 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4997">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-4998">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-4998">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5012">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5012">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5013">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5013">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5014">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5014">Germany passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5016">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5016">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5018">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5018">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5019">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5019">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5020">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5020">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5021">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5021">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5022">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5022">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5023">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5024">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5026">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5026">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5027">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5027">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5028">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5028">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5029">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5030">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5030">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5031">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5031">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5032">키워드가 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5032">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5033">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5033">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5034">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5034">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5046">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5046">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5047">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5047">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5048">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5048">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5056">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5056">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5057">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5058">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5058">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5059">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5060">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5060">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5061">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5061">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5062">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5062">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5063">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5063">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5064">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5064">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5065">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5065">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5066">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5066">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5067">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5067">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5068">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5068">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5069">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5070">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5070">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5071">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5072">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5072">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5073">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5073">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5074">키워드가  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5074">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5075">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5075">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5076">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5076">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5077">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5077">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5078">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5078">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5079">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5079">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5081">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5081">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5082">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5082">steuernummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5084">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5084">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5085">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5085">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5086">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5086">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5087">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5087">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5088">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5088">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5089">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5089">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5090">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5090">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5091">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5091">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5092">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5092">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5093">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5093">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5094">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5094">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5095">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5095">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5096">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5096">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5097">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5097">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5098">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5098">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5099">zinn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5099">zinn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5101">zinnnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5101">zinnnummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5102">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5102">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5103">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5103">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5104">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5104">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5105">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5105">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5106">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5106">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5107">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5107">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5108">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5108">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5109">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5110">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5110">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5112">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5112">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5113">D 또는 d 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5113">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5114">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5114">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5115">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5115">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5116">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5116">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5117">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5117">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5118">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5118">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5119">선택적 공백 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5119">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5120">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5120">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5121">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5122">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5122">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5124">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5124">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5125">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5125">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5126">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5126">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5127">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5127">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5128">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5128">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5138">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5138">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5139">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5140">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5140">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5142">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5142">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5143">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5144">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5144">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5145">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5146">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5146">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5147">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5147">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5148">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5148">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5274">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5274">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5275">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5276">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5276">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5278">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5278">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5279">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5279">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5280">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5280">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5281">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5281">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5282">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5282">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5283">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5283">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5284">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5284">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5285">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5285">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5286">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5286">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5287">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5287">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5288">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5288">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5289">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5289">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5290">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5290">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5291">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5291">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5292">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5292">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5293">정규식은 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5293">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5294">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5294">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5295">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5295">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5296">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5296">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5297">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5297">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5298">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5298">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5299">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5299">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5300">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5300">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5301">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5301">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5302">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5302">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5303">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5303">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5304">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5304">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5305">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5306">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5306">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5307">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5308">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5308">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5309">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5310">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5310">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5312">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5312">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5313">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5313">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5314">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5315">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5315">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5316">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5316">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5317">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5317">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5318">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5319">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5319">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5329">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5329">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5330">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5330">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5331">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5331">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5332">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5332">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5333">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5333">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5334">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5334">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5335">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5335">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5336">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5336">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5337">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5337">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5338">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5338">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5339">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5339">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5340">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5340">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5341">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5341">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5342">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5342">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5343">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5343">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5344">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5344">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5345">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5345">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5346">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5346">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5347">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5347">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5348">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5349">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5349">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5350">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5351">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5352">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5352">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5353">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5353">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5354">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5354">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5355">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5355">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5356">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5356">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5357">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5357">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5358">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5358">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5359">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5359">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5360">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5360">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5361">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5361">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5362">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5362">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5363">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5363">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5364">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5364">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5365">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5365">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5366">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5366">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5367">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5367">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5368">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5368">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5369">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5369">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5370">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5370">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5371">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5371">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5372">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5372">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5373">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5374">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5374">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5375">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5376">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5376">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5377">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5378">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5378">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5379">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5380">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5380">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5381">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5381">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5382">키워드가  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5382">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5390">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5390">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5404">taxregistryno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5404">taxregistryno#</span></span>

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5411">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5411">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5412">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5412">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5413">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5413">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5414">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5414">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5415">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5415">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5416">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5416">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5417">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5417">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5418">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5418">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5419">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5420">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5420">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5421">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5422">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5422">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5423">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5423">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5424">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5424">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5425">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5425">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5426">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5426">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5427">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5427">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5428">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5428">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>

  </Pattern>

  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
