## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5468">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5468">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5469">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5470">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5470">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5472">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5472">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5473">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5473">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5474">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5474">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5475">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5476">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5477">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5478">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5479">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5479">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5480">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5480">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5605">헝가리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5605">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5606">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5606">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5607">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5607">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5608">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5608">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5609">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5609">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5610">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5610">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5611">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5611">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5612">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5613">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5613">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5614">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5614">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5615">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5615">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5616">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 여성, 2-여성, 기타 번호는 1900년 이전의 시민 또는 이중 시민권이 있는 시민도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5616">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5617">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5617">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5618">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5618">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5619">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5619">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5620">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5621">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5621">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5623">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5623">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5624">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5624">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5625">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5625">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5626">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5627">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5627">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5628">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5629">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5629">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5630">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5630">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5631">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5631">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5632">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5632">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5633">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5633">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5634">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5634">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5635">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5635">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5636">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5636">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5637">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5637">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5638">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5638">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5639">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5640">2개의 문자와 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5640">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5642">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5642">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5643">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5644">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5644">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5645">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5646">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5646">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5647">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5647">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5648">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5648">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5649">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5649">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5650">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5650">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5651">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5651">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5652">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5652">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5660">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5660">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5669">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5669">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5670">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5670">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5671">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5671">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5672">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5672">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5673">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5673">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5674">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5675">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5675">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5676">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5677">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5677">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5678">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5678">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5679">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5679">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5680">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5680">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5681">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5681">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5701">헝가리 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5701">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5702">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5702">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5703">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5703">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5704">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5704">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5705">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5705">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5706">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5706">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5707">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5707">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5708">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5709">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5709">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5710">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5711">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5711">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5712">"8"을 입력해야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5712">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5713">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5713">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5714">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5714">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5715">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5716">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5716">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5718">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5719">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5719">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5720">키워드가  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5720">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5721">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5722">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5722">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5723">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5723">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5724">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5724">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5725">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5725">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5726">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5726">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5727">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5727">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5728">헝가리어 주석</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5728">hungarian tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5729">hungatiantin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5729">hungatiantin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5730">tax authority no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5730">tax authority no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5731">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5731">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5732">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5732">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5733">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5733">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5734">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5734">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5736">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5736">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5737">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5737">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5738">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5738">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5739">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5739">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5740">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5740">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5741">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5741">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5742">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5742">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5743">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5743">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5744">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5744">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5745">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5745">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5746">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5746">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5747">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5747">vat number</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5748">헝가리 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5748">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5749">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5749">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5750">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5750">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5751">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5751">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5752">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5752">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5753">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5753">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5754">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5754">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5755">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5756">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5756">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5757">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5758">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5758">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5759">2자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5759">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5760">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5760">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5761">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5761">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5762">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5763">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5765">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5765">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5766">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5766">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5767">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5767">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5768">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5768">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5769">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5769">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5770">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5770">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5771">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5771">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5772">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5772">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5773">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5773">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5774">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5774">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5775">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5775">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5776">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5776">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5777">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5777">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5778">부가가치세 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5778">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5779">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5779">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5780">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5780">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5781">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5781">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5782">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5782">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5783">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5783">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5784">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5785">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5785">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5787">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5787">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5788">3개의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5788">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5789">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5789">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5790">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5790">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5791">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5791">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5792">문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5792">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5793">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5794">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5794">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5795">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5796">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5796">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5797">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5797">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5798">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5798">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5799">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5799">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5800">정규식은 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5800">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5801">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5801">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5802">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5802">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5803">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5803">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5804">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5804">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5805">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5805">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5806">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5807">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5807">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5809">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5809">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5810">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5810">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5811">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5811">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5812">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5812">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5813">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5813">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5814">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5814">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5815">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5815">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5816">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5817">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5817">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5818">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5819">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5819">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5820">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5820">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5821">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5821">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5822">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5822">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5823">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5823">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5824">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5824">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5825">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5825">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5826">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5826">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5827">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5827">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5828">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5828">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5829">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5829">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5830">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5830">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5831">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5831">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5832">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5832">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5833">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5833">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5834">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5834">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5835">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5836">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5836">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5837">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5837">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5838">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5838">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5839">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5839">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5840">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5840">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5841">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5841">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5842">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5842">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5843">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5843">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5844">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5844">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5845">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5845">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5846">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5846">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5847">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5847">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5848">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5848">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5849">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5849">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5850">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5850">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5851">정규식은 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5851">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5852">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5852">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5853">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5853">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5854">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5854">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5855">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5855">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5856">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5856">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5857">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5857">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5858">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5858">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5860">국가 코드(2자) 및 체크 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5860">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5862">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5862">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5863">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5863">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5864">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5864">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5865">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5865">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5866">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5866">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5867">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5867">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5868">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5868">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5869">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5869">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5870">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5873">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5873">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5874">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5874">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5875">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5876">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5876">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5877">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5877">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5878">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5878">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5879">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5879">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5880">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5880">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5881">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5881">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5882">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5882">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5883">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5884">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5884">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5885">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5886">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5886">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5887">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5887">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5888">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5888">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5889">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5890">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5890">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5891">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5891">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5892">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5892">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5893">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5893">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5894">[ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5894">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5895">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5895">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5896">국제질병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5896">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5897">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5897">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5898">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5898">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5899">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5899">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5900">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5900">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5901">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5902">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5903">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5904">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5904">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5905">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5905">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5906">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5906">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5907">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5907">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5908">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5908">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5909">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5909">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5910">국제질병 분류Dictionary_icd_9_updated 9번째 수정, [ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5910">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5911">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5911">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5912">[ICD-9-CM(ICD-9-CM)의](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)국제 분류인 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5912">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5913">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드를 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5913">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5914">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5914">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5915">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5915">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5916">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5916">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5917">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5917">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5918">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5918">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5919">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5919">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5920">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5920">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5921">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5922">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5923">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5924">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 경우 높은 신뢰도로 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5924">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5925">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5925">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5926">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5926">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5927">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5927">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5928">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5928">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5929">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5929">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5930">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5930">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5931">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5931">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5932">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5932">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5933">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5933">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5934">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5934">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5935">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5935">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5936">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5936">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5937">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5937">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5938">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5938">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5939">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5939">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5940">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5940">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5941">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5942">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5942">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5943">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5943">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5944">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5944">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5945">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5945">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5946">4개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5946">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5947">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5947">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5948">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5948">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5949">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5949">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5950">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5950">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5951">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5951">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-5952">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-5952">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6076">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6076">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6077">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6078">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6078">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6080">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6080">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6081">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6081">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6082">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6082">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6083">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6084">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6084">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6086">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6087">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6087">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6088">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6088">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6089">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6089">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6090">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6091">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6091">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6092">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6092">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6116">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6116">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6117">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6118">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6118">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6119">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6119">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6120">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6120">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6121">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6121">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6123">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6123">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6124">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6124">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6125">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6125">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6126">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6126">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6127">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6127">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6128">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6128">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6129">범위 A-I 또는 "W"의 선택적 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6129">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6130">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6133">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6133">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6134">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6134">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6135">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6135">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6137">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6137">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6138">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6138">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
