## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6184">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6184">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6185">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6185">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6186">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6186">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6187">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6187">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6188">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6188">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6189">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6189">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6190">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6190">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6191">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6191">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6192">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6192">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6193">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6193">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6194">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6194">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6195">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6195">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6196">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6197">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6197">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6199">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6199">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6200">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6200">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6201">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6201">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6202">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6202">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6203">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6203">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6204">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6204">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6205">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6205">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6206">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6206">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6207">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6207">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6208">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6208">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6209">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6210">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6210">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6212">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6212">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6213">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6214">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6216">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6216">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6217">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6217">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6218">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6218">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6225">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6225">זהותישר אלית</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6238">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6238">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6239">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6240">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6240">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6242">10개 문자 및 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6242">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6243">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6243">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6244">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6244">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6245">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6245">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6246">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6246">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6247">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6248">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6250">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6251">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6251">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6252">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6252">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6253">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6253">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6254">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6254">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6255">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6255">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6256">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6256">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6257">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6257">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6258">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6258">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6259">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6259">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6260">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6260">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6261">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6262">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6263">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6264">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6265">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6266">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6267">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6268">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6268">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6270">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6270">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6271">패밀리 이름에 있는 처음 세 자위에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6271">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6272">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자국어에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6272">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6273">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6273">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6274">생년월일의 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6274">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6275">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 2자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6275">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6276">사람이 태어나는 시외 지역에 해당하는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6276">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6277">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6277">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6278">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6279">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6279">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6281">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6282">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6282">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6283">키워드가  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6285">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6285">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6293">numero certificato personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6293">numero certificato personale</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6297">개인 인증서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6297">personal certificate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6311">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6311">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6316">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6316">taxnumber</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6320">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6320">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6321">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6322">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6322">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6323">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6324">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6324">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6325">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6325">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6326">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6326">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6327">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6327">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6328">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6328">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6329">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6329">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6330">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6330">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6331">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6331">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6332">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6332">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6333">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6333">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6334">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6335">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6335">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6336">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6360">이탈리아 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6360">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6361">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6361">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6362">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6362">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6363">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6363">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6364">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6364">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6365">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6365">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6366">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6366">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6367">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6368">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6368">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6369">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6370">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 13개 문자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6370">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6371">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6371">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6372">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6372">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6373">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 COMMA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6373">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6374">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6374">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6375">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6376">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6378">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6378">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6379">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6379">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6380">검색된 키워드가 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6380">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6381">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6382">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6382">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6383">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6383">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6384">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6384">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6387">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6387">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6388">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6388">iva</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6390">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6390">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6391">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6391">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6392">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6392">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6393">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6393">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6394">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6394">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6395">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6395">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6396">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6396">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6397">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6397">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6398">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6398">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6399">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6399">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6400">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6401">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6401">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6403">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6404">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6404">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6405">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6405">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6406">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6406">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6407">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6407">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6408">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6408">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6409">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6409">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6410">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6410">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6411">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6411">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6412">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6412">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6413">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6413">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6416">Checking Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6416">Checking Account #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6422">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6422">Bank Account</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6458">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6458">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6459">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6460">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6460">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6461">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6462">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6462">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6463">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6464">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6464">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6466">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6466">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6467">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6467">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6468">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6468">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6506">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6506">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6507">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6507">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6508">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6508">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6509">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6509">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6510">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6510">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6511">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6511">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6512">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6512">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6513">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6514">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6514">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6516">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6516">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6517">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6517">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6518">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6518">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6519">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6520">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6520">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6521">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6522">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6522">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6523">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6523">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6524">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6524">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6525">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6526">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6526">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6527">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6527">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6528">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6528">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6529">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6529">corporate number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6533">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6533">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6534">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6534">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6535">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6535">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6536">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6536">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6537">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6537">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6538">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6538">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6539">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6539">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6540">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6540">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6541">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6541">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6542">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6542">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6543">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6543">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6544">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6544">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6545">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6545">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6546">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6547">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6547">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6548">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6548">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6549">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6549">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6550">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6550">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6551">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6551">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6552">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6552">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6553">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6553">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6554">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6554">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6555">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6556">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6556">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6557">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6558">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6559">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6559">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6560">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6560">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6561">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6561">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6562">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6562">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6563">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6563">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6564">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6564">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6565">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6565">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6566">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6566">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6567">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6567">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6568">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6568">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6569">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6569">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6570">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6570">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6571">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6571">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6572">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6572">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6573">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6573">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6574">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6574">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6575">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6575">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6576">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6577">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6577">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6578">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6579">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6579">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6580">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6581">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6582">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6583">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6584">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6584">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6585">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6585">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6586">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6586">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6587">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6587">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6588">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6588">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6589">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6589">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6590">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6590">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6591">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6591">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6592">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6592">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6593">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6593">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6594">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6594">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6595">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6595">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6596">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6596">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6597">೺೺固</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6597">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6598">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6598">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6599">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6599">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6600">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6600">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6601">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6601">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6602">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6602">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6603">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6604">12개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6604">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6606">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6606">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6607">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6607">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6608">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6608">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6609">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6609">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6610">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6611">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6611">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6613">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6613">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6614">정규식은 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6614">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6615">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6615">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6616">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6616">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6617">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6617">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6618">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6618">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6619">거주 카드 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6619">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6620">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6620">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6621">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6621">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6622">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6622">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6623">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6623">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6624">일본 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6624">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6625">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6626">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6626">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6628">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6628">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6629">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6630">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6630">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6631">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6632">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6632">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6633">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6633">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6634">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6634">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6647">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6647">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6648">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6648">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6649">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6649">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6650">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6650">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6651">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6651">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6652">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6652">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6653">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6653">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6654">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6654">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6655">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6655">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6656">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6659">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6659">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6660">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6660">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6661">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6661">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6662">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6662">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6663">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6663">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6664">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6680">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6680">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6681">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6681">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6682">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6682">雇用保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6685">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6685">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6686">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6687">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6687">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6689">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6689">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6690">3개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6690">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6691">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6691">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6692">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6693">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6693">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6695">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6696">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6696">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6697">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6697">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6822">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6822">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6823">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6824">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6824">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6825">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6825">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6826">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6826">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6827">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6827">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6828">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6828">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6829">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6829">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6830">생년월일 세기(19 세기의 경우 "0", 20년의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6830">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6831">4자리 숫자(임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6831">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6832">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6832">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6833">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6833">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6834">2자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6834">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6835">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6835">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6836">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6837">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6837">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6838">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6839">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6840">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6840">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6841">키워드가  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6841">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6842">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6843">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6843">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6906">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6906">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6907">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6908">2개의 문자 또는 숫자 다음에 공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6908">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6909">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6910">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6910">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6911">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6911">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6912">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6912">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6913">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6914">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6914">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6916">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6916">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6917">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6917">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6918">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6918">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6919">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6919">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6920">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6921">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6921">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6922">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6922">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6945">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6945">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6946">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6946">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6947">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6947">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6948">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6948">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6949">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6949">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6950">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6951">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6951">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6952">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6953">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6953">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6954">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6954">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6955">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6955">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6956">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6956">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6957">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6957">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-6958">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-6958">driverlic</span></span>
