### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7087">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7087">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7088">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7088">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7089">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7090">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7090">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7091">생년월일과 성별에 해당하는 1-6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7091">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7092">생년월일에 해당하는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7092">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7093">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7093">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7094">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7094">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7095">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7096">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7096">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7099">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7099">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7100">키워드가  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7100">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7101">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7101">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7102">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7102">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7137">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7137">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7138">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7139">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7139">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7140">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7141">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7141">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7142">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7143">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7143">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7145">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7146">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7146">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7147">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7147">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7148">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7148">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7149">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7149">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7150">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7150">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7151">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7151">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7164">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7164">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7165">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7165">paso numeris</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7166">paso numeriai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7166">paso numeriai</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7168">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7168">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7169">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7169">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7170">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7170">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7171">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7171">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7172">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7173">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7173">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7174">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7175">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7175">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7176">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7177">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7177">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7178">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7179">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7179">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7180">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7180">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7181">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7181">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
```

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7313">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7313">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7314">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7315">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7315">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7316">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7316">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7317">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7317">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7318">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7318">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7319">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7319">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7320">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7320">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7321">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7321">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7322">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7322">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7323">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7323">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7324">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7325">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7325">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7326">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7326">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7336">개별 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7336">individual identification</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7348">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7348">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7349">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7350">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7350">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7351">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7352">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7352">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7353">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7354">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7356">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7356">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7357">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7358">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7358">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7359">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7359">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7360">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7361">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7361">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7362">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7393">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7393">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7394">룩세르부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7394">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7395">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7395">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7396">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7396">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7397">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7397">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7398">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7398">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7399">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7399">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7400">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7400">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7401">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7401">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7402">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7402">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7403">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7403">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7404">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7404">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7405">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7405">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7406">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7406">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7407">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7408">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7408">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7410">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7410">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7411">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7411">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7412">키워드가  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7412">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7413">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7414">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7414">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7454">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7454">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7455">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7456">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7456">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7458">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7458">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7459">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7459">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7460">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7460">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7461">생년월일 코드 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7461">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7462">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7462">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7463">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7463">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7464">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7464">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7465">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7466">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7466">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7468">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7468">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7469">정규식은 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7469">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7470">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7470">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7472">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7472">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7473">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7473">digital application card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7485">kad pengenalan 말레이시아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7485">kad pengenalan malaysia</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7486">kp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7486">kp</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7487">kp no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7487">kp no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7488">mykad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7488">mykad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7489">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7489">mykas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7490">mykid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7490">mykid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7492">mytentera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7492">mytentera</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7493">말레이시아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7493">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7494">malaysian identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7494">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7495">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7495">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7496">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7496">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7497">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7497">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7498">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7499">지정한 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7499">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7501">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7501">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7502">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7502">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7503">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7503">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7504">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7504">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7505">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7505">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7506">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7506">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7507">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7508">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7509">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7510">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7511">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7511">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7512">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7644">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7644">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7645">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7646">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7646">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7647">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7647">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7648">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7648">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7649">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7650">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7650">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7651">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7652">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7652">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7653">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7653">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7654">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7654">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7655">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7655">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7656">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7656">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7657">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7658">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7658">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7659">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7659">citizen service number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7661">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7661">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7662">kodiċi personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7662">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7663">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7663">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7664">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7664">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7665">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7665">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7666">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7666">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7667">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7667">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7668">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7668">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7669">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7669">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7670">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7670">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7671">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7671">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7672">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7672">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7673">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7673">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7674">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7675">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7675">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7677">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7677">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7678">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7678">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7679">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7679">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7680">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7680">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7681">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7681">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7682">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7682">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7683">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7683">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7684">검색된 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7684">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7685">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7686">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7686">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7687">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7687">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7688">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7689">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7689">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7692">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7692">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7693">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7693">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7694">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7694">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7695">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7695">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7696">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7696">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7697">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7697">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7698">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7698">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7699">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7699">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7700">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7700">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7701">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7701">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7702">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7702">numri tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7703">Nru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7703">Nru tal-passaport</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7704">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7704">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7705">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7705">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7706">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7706">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7707">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7707">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7708">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7709">몰타 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7709">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7710">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7710">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7711">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7711">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7712">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7712">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7713">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7713">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7714">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7714">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7715">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7715">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7716">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7716">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7717">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7717">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7718">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7718">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7719">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7720">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7720">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7721">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7722">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7723">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7723">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7724">키워드가  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7724">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7725">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7725">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7726">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7726">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7727">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7727">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7728">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7728">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7729">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7729">citizen service number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7759">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7759">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7760">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7761">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7761">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7762">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7762">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7763">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7763">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7764">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7764">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7765">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7765">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7766">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7766">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7767">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7767">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7768">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7768">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7769">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7770">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7770">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7771">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7772">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7772">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7773">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7773">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7774">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7774">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7775">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7799">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7799">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7800">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7801">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7801">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7802">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7803">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7803">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7804">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7807">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7808">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7808">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7809">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7937">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7937">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7938">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7939">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7939">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7940">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7941">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7941">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7942">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7943">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7943">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7944">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7945">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7946">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7946">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7947">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7948">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7948">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7949">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7950">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7950">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7951">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7951">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7969">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7969">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7970">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7970">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7971">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7971">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7972">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7972">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7973">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7973">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7974">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7974">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7975">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7975">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7976">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7977">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7977">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7978">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7978">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7979">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7979">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7980">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7981">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7983">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7984">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7984">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7985">키워드가  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7985">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7986">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7986">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-7987">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-7987">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8025">네덜란드 값 추가 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8025">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8026">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8026">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8027">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8027">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8028">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8028">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8029">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8029">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8030">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8030">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8031">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8031">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8032">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8032">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8033">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8033">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8034">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8034">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8035">14자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8035">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8036">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8036">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8037">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8037">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8038">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8038">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8039">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8039">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8040">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8040">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8041">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8041">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8042">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8042">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8043">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8043">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8044">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8044">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8045">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8045">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8046">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8046">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8047">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8047">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8048">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8048">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8049">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8049">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8050">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8050">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8051">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8051">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8053">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8053">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8055">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8055">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8056">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8056">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8057">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8057">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8059">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8059">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8060">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8060">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8061">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8061">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8062">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8062">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8063">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8063">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8064">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8064">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8065">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8065">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8066">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8066">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8067">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8067">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8068">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8069">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14-16자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8069">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8070">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8070">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8071">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8071">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8072">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8072">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8073">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8073">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8074">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8074">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8075">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8075">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8076">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8076">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8077">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8077">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8078">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8078">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8079">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8079">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8080">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8080">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8081">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8081">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8082">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8082">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8083">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8083">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8084">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8085">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8085">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8086">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8086">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8087">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8087">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8088">account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8088">account number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8089">bank account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8089">bank account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8090">bank_acct_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8090">bank_acct_id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8091">bank_acct_branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8091">bank_acct_branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8092">bank_acct_nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8092">bank_acct_nbr</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8093">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8093">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8094">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8094">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8095">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8095">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8096">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8096">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8097">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8097">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8098">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8098">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8099">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8099">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8100">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8100">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8101">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8101">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8102">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8102">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8103">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8103">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8104">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8104">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8105">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8105">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8106">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8107">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8108">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8109">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8110">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8110">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8111">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8111">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8112">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8112">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8113">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8113">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
