- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8177">international driving permits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8177">international driving permits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8178">nz 자동차 연결</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8178">nz automobile association</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8179">뉴질랜드 자동차 협회</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8179">new zealand automobile association</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8180">뉴질랜드 내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8180">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8181">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8181">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8182">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8182">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8183">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8183">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8184">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8184">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8185">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8185">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8186">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8186">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8187">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8188">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8188">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8189">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8190">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8190">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8191">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8191">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8192">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8192">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8193">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8193">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8194">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8194">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8195">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8195">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8196">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8197">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8197">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8199">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8199">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8200">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8200">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8201">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8201">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8202">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8202">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8203">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8203">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8204">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8204">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8205">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8205">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8206">ird no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8206">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8207">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8207">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8208">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8208">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8209">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8209">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8210">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8210">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8211">내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8211">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8212">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8212">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8213">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8214">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8214">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8215">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8215">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8216">'I'와 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8216">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8217">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8217">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8218">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8218">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8219">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8220">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8220">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8222">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8223">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8223">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8224">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8224">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8225">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8226">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8227">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8227">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8228">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8230">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8230">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8234">처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8234">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8235">National Health Index Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8235">National Health Index Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8237">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8237">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8238">NHI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8238">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8239">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8239">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8240">국가 상태 인덱스 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8240">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8241">국가 상태 인덱스 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8241">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8242">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8242">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8243">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8243">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8244">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8244">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8245">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8245">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8246">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8246">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8247">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8247">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8248">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8248">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8249">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8250">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8250">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8251">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8252">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8252">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8253">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8253">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8254">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8254">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8255">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8255">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8256">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8256">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8257">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8257">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8258">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8259">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8259">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8260">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8261">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8261">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8262">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8262">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8263">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8263">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8264">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8264">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8265">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8265">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8266">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8266">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8267">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8267">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8268">social social #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8268">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8269">social social #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8269">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8270">social social social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8270">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8271">social social number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8271">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8272">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8272">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8273">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8273">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8274">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8275">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8275">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8277">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8277">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8278">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8278">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8279">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8279">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8280">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8280">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8281">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8282">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8282">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8284">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8285">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8285">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8286">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8286">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8287">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8287">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8288">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8288">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8289">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8289">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8290">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8299">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8299">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8300">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8301">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8301">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8302">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8303">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8303">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8304">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8304">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8305">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8305">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8306">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8306">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8307">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8307">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8308">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8308">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8309">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8310">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8310">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8312">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8312">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8313">정규식은 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8313">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8314">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8314">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8315">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8315">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8316">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8316">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8317">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8317">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8318">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8318">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8319">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8319">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8320">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8320">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8321">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8321">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8322">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8323">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8323">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8324">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8325">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8325">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8326">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8326">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8327">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8327">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8328">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8328">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8329">슬래시(슬래시)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8329">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8330">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8330">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8331">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8332">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8333">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8334">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8335">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8335">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8336">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8460">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8460">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8461">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8462">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8462">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8464">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8464">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8465">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8466">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8466">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8468">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8468">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8469">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8469">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8470">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8470">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8471">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8471">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8472">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8472">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8473">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8473">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8475">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8475">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8476">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8476">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8477">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8477">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8478">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8478">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8479">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8479">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8480">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8480">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8481">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8481">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8482">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8482">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8483">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8484">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8484">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8485">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8486">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8486">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8487">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8487">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8488">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8488">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8489">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8489">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8490">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8490">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8491">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8491">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8492">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8492">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8493">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8493">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8494">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8494">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8495">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8495">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8496">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8496">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8497">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8497">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8498">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8498">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8499">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8499">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8500">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8500">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8501">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8501">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8502">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8502">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8503">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8503">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8504">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8504">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8505">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8505">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8506">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8506">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8507">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8507">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8508">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8508">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8509">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8509">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8510">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8510">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8511">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8511">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8512">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8512">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8513">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8513">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8514">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8514">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8515">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8515">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8516">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8517">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8517">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8518">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8519">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8519">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8520">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8520">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8521">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8521">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8522">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8522">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8523">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8523">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8524">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8524">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8525">Numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8525">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8526">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8526">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8527">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8527">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8528">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8528">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8529">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8529">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8530">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8530">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8531">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8531">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8532">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8532">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8533">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8533">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8534">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8534">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8535">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8535">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8536">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8537">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8537">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8539">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8539">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8540">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8540">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8541">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8541">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8542">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8542">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8543">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8543">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8544">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8545">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8546">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8547">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8548">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8548">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8549">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8549">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8550">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8550">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8551">이 Func_polish_regon_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8551">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8553">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8553">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8554">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8554">regon id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8556">statistical id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8556">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8557">statistical no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8557">statistical no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8559">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8559">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8560">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8560">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8561">company id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8561">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8562">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8562">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8563">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8563">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8564">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8564">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8565">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8565">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8566">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8566">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8567">numeruregon #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8567">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8568">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8568">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8569">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8569">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8570">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8570">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8571">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8571">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8572">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8572">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8573">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8573">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8574">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8574">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8575">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8576">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8576">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8577">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8578">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8578">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8579">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8580">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8580">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8581">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8582">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8582">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8583">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8583">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8584">키워드가  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8584">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8585">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8585">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8586">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8586">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8587">nip #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8587">nip#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8588">nip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8588">nip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8589">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8589">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8590">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8590">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8614">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8614">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8615">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8616">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8616">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8617">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8618">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8618">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8619">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8620">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8622">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8623">정규식은 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8623">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8624">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8624">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8644">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8644">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8645">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8645">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8646">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8646">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8647">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8647">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8648">패턴 1: 문자 2자, 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8648">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8649">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8649">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8650">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8650">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8651">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8651">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8652">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8652">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8653">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8653">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8654">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8654">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8655">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8655">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8656">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8656">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8657">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8657">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8658">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8658">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8659">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8659">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8660">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8661">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8661">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8662">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8663">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8663">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8664">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8664">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8665">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8665">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8797">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8797">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8798">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8799">문자 한 개와 공백이나 따로 숫자가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8799">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8800">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8801">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8801">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8802">한 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8802">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8803">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8803">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8804">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8805">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8807">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8807">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8808">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8808">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8809">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8809">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8810">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8810">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8811">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8811">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8812">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8812">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8813">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8813">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8840">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8840">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8841">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8842">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8842">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8843">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8844">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8844">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8845">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8845">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8846">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8846">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8847">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8847">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8848">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8848">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8849">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8850">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8850">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8851">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8852">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8853">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8853">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8854">키워드가  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8854">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8855">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8856">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8856">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8881">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8881">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8882">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8883">한 문자와 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8883">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8884">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8885">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8885">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8886">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8886">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8887">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8887">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8888">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8889">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8889">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8890">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8891">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8892">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8892">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-8893">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-8893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9021">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9021">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9022">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9022">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9023">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9023">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9024">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9024">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9025">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9025">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9026">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9026">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9027">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9027">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9028">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9028">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9029">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9029">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9030">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9030">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9031">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9031">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9032">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9032">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9033">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9033">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9034">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9034">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9035">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9036">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9036">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9037">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9038">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9038">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9039">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9039">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9040">키워드가  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9040">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9041">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9041">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9042">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9042">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9093">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9093">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9094">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9094">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9095">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9095">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9096">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9096">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9097">8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9097">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9098">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9099">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9099">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9100">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9101">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9101">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9102">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9102">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9103">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9103">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9104">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9104">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9105">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9105">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9106">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9106">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9107">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9107">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
