## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9125">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9125">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9126">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9126">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9127">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9127">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9128">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9128">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9129">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9129">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9130">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9130">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9131">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9131">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9132">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9133">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9133">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9135">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9135">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9136">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9136">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9137">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9137">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9138">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9138">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9139">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9139">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9140">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9140">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9141">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9142">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9143">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9144">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9145">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9145">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9146">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9146">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9157">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9157">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9158">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9158">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9159">паспорт #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9159">паспорт#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9160">рра рр ар ра рр #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9160">паспортid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9161">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9161">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9162">номерпаспорта #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9162">номерпаспорта#</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9163">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9163">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9164">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9164">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9165">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9165">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9166">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9166">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9167">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9167">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9168">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9168">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9169">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9169">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9170">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9170">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9171">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9171">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9172">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9172">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9173">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9173">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9174">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9174">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9175">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9175">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9176">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9176">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9177">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9178">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9178">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9180">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9180">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9181">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9181">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9182">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9182">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9183">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9183">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_russia_passport_number_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9184">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9184">Keywords_russia_passport_number_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9185">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9185">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9186">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9186">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9187">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9187">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9188">passport id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9188">passport id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9189">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9189">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9190">passportnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9190">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9191">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9191">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9192">рра ра рр а 1015 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9192">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9193">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9193">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9194">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9194">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9195">паспорт #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9195">паспорт#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9196">рара ра рра ар ар ра р #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9196">паспортid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9197">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9197">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9198">номерпаспорта #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9198">номерпаспорта#</span></span>


## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9199">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9199">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9200">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9201">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9201">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9203">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9203">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9204">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9205">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9205">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9206">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9207">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9208">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9208">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9209">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9209">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9210">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9210">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9211">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9211">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9212">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9212">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9213">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9213">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9214">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9214">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9215">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9215">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9216">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9216">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9217">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9218">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9218">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9219">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9220">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9220">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9221">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9221">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9222">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9222">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9223">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9223">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9224">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9225">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9226">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9227">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9228">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9228">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9229">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_singapore_nric 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9229">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9230">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9230">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9231">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9231">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9232">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9232">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9233">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9233">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9234">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9234">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9235">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9235">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9236">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9236">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9237">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9237">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9238">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9238">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9239">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9239">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9240">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9240">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9241">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9241">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9242">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9242">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9243">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9243">身份證</span></span> 

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9244">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9244">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9245">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9246">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9246">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9248">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9248">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9249">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9249">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9250">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9250">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9251">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9252">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9252">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9253">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9254">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9255">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9255">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9256">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9388">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9388">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9389">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9389">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9390">선택적 백사시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9390">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9391">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9391">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9392">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9392">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9393">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9393">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9394">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9394">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9395">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9395">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9396">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9399">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9400">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9400">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9401">키워드가  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9401">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9402">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9402">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9403">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9403">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9450">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9450">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9451">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9452">1자리 숫자 또는 문자, 공백이나 따로 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9452">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9453">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9454">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ),7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9454">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9455">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9456">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9456">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9457">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9458">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9458">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9459">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9459">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9460">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9460">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9461">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9461">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9462">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9463">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9463">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9464">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9464">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9485">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9485">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9486">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9486">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9487">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9488">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9488">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9490">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9490">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9491">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9494">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9494">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9495">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9495">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9496">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9619">voznikaka aratevilka licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9619">vozniška številka licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9622">휘트vilke vozni의kih dovoljenj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9622">številke vozniških dovoljenj</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9623">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9623">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9624">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9624">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9625">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9625">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9626">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9626">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9627">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9627">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9628">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9628">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9629">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9629">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9630">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9630">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9631">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9631">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9632">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9632">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9633">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9633">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9634">생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자입니다. 여기서 "LLL"은 생년월일의 마지막 세 자리 숫자에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9634">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9635">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9635">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9636">같은 날에 출산한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9636">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9637">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9637">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9638">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9639">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9639">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9640">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9641">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9641">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9642">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9642">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9643">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9643">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9644">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9644">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9645">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9645">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9673">스로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9673">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9674">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9675">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자(공백 또는 디지타이터 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9675">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9676">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9677">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9677">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9678">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9678">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9679">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9679">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9680">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9680">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9681">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9681">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9682">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9682">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9683">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9683">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9684">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9684">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9685">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9685">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9686">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9686">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9687">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9687">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9688">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9689">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9689">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9690">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9690">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9691">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9692">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9692">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9701">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9701">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9702">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9702">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9703">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9703">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9704">katevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9704">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9705">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9705">potek veljavnosti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9706">potni 목록 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9706">potni list#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9707">datum rojstva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9707">datum rojstva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9708">potni 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9708">potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9709">iltevilke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9709">številke potnih listov</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9710">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9710">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9711">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9711">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9712">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9712">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9713">스로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9713">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9714">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9715">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9716">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9717">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9718">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9719">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9720">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9721">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9721">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9722">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9722">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9723">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9723">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9724">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9724">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9725">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9725">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9726">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9727">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9727">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9729">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9730">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9730">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9731">키워드가  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9731">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9732">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9732">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9733">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9733">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9750">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9750">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9757">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9757">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9758">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9759">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9759">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9760">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9761">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9761">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9762">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9762">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9763">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9763">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9764">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9764">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9765">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9765">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9766">체크 아웃 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9766">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9767">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9768">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9768">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9770">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9770">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9771">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9771">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9772">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9772">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9773">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9774">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9774">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9775">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9775">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9776">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9776">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9777">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9777">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9778">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9778">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9779">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9779">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9780">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9781">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9781">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9783">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9783">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9784">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9784">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9785">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9785">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9786">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9786">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9787">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9787">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9788">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9788">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9789">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9789">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9790">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9791">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9791">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9793">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9793">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9794">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9794">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9795">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 검색됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9795">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9797">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9797">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9798">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9798">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9799">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9800">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9800">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9801">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9801">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9802">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9802">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9803">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9803">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9804">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9804">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9805">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9805">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9806">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9806">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9807">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9807">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9808">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9808">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9809">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9809">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9810">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9810">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9811">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9811">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9812">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9812">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9813">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9813">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9814">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9815">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9815">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9817">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9817">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9818">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9818">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9819">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9819">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9820">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9820">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9821">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9821">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9955">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9955">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9956">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9956">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9957">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9957">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9958">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9958">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9959">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9959">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9960">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9960">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9961">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9961">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9962">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9963">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9963">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9964">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9965">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9965">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9966">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9966">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9967">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9967">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9968">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9968">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9969">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9970">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9970">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9972">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9973">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9973">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9974">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9974">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9975">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-9976">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-9976">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10000">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10000">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10001">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10002">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10002">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10004">8-9자 또는 9자 조합 문자와 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10004">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10005">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10005">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10006">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10006">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10007">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10007">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10008">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10009">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10009">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10011">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10012">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10012">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10013">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10013">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10014">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10014">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10015">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10016">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10016">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10017">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10017">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10018">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10018">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10019">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10019">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>
