## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10046">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10046">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10047">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10048">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10048">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10049">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10050">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10050">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10051">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10051">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10052">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10052">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10053">7~8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10053">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10054">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10054">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10055">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10055">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10056">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10057">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10057">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10058">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10059">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10059">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10060">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10060">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10061">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10061">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10062">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10062">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10063">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10063">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10064">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10064">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10065">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10065">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10066">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10066">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10067">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10067">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10068">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10068">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10069">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10069">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10070">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10070">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10071">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10072">지정한 패턴의 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10072">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10073">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10074">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10074">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10075">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10075">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10076">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10076">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10077">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10077">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10078">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10078">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10079">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10079">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10080">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10081">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10081">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10082">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10082">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10083">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10083">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10084">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10085">내국인 식별 번호가 있는 외신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10085">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10086">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10086">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10087">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10087">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10088">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10089">외신의 ID 번호가 없는 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10089">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10090">"M"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10090">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10091">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10091">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10092">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10092">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10093">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10094">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10094">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10095">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10096">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10097">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10097">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10098">키워드가  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10098">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10099">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10099">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10100">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 함수를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10100">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10101">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10101">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10102">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10102">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10113">tax file no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10113">tax file no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10115">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10115">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10116">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10116">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10117">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10117">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10118">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10118">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10124">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10124">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10131">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10131">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10132">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10133">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10133">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10134">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10135">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10135">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10136">소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10136">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10137">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" 여기서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10137">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10138">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10138">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10139">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미클론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10139">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10140">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 따오기 표시(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10140">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10141">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10141">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10142">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10143">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10144">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10145">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10146">정규식은 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10146">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10147">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 **수** 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10147">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10148">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder **패턴과** 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10148">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10149">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords **일치하는** 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10149">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10150">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10150">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10151">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10152">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10152">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10153">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10153">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10154">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10154">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10155">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10155">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10156">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10156">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10157">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10157">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10158">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) --OR--</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10158">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10159">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10159">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10160">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10160">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10161">기호보다 작음(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10161">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10162">대/소문자, 자릿수, 상용구(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10162">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10163">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10163">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10164">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10164">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10165">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10165">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10166">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10166">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10169">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10169">sandbox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10172">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10172">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10173">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10173">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10174">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10174">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10175">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10175">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10176">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10176">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10177">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10177">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10178">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10178">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10179">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10179">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10180">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10180">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10181">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10181">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10182">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10182">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10183">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10184">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10184">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10185">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10186">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10188">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10188">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10189">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10189">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10190">키워드가  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 발견되거나 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10190">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10219">driver'license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10219">driver'license</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10323">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10323">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10324">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10325">10자리 또는 12자리 숫자 및 선택적 분수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10325">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10326">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10327">10자리 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적분리형:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10327">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10328">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10328">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10329">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10329">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10330">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10330">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10331">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10331">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10332">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10333">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10333">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10335">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10336">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10336">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10337">검색된 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10337">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10338">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10338">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10339">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10340">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10340">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10360">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10360">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10361">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10361">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10362">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10363">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10363">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10364">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10365">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10365">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10366">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10367">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10367">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10368">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10369">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10369">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10370">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10370">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10371">다음 중 하나는 true입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10371">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10372">검색된 Keyword_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10372">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10373">검색된 Keyword_sweden_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10373">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10404">스웨덴 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10404">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10405">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10406">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10407">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10408">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10409">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10410">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10411">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10412">10자리 숫자 및 지정된 패턴의 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10412">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10413">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10414">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10414">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10415">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10415">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10416">더하기 기호 또는 minus 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10416">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10417">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 3자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10417">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10418">1990년 이전 발급된 숫자의 경우 7-8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외세의 신생아를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10418">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10419">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성의 홀수 또는 심지어 여성으로 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10419">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10420">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10420">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10421">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10422">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10422">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10423">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10424">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10424">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10425">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10425">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10426">키워드가  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10426">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10427">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10427">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10428">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10428">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10443">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10443">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10444">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10444">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10445">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10445">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10446">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10446">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10447">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10447">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10448">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10448">taxno#</span></span>

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10454">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10454">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10455">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10456">4개의 문자와 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10456">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10458">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10458">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10459">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10459">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10460">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10460">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10461">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10461">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10462">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10462">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10463">1~3자리 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10463">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10464">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10464">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10465">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10465">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10466">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10466">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10467">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10468">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10468">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10469">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10469">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10506">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10506">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10507">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10507">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10508">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10508">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10509">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10509">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10510">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10510">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10511">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10511">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10512">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10512">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10513">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10514">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10514">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10515">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10516">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10516">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10517">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10517">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10518">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10518">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10519">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10519">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10520">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10520">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10521">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10521">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10522">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10522">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10523">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10523">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10524">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10525">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10525">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10526">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10527">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10528">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10528">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10529">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10529">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10530">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10531">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10531">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10549">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10549">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10550">identification personnelle id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10550">identification personnelle id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10551">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10551">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10552">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10552">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10553">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10553">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10554">한 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10554">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10555">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10555">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10556">한 문자(영어)와 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10556">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10557">한 문자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10557">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10558">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10558">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10559">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10559">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10560">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10560">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10561">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10561">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10562">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10562">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10563">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10563">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10564">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10564">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10565">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10565">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10566">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10566">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10567">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10567">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10568">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10568">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10569">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10569">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10570">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10570">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10571">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10571">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10572">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10572">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10573">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10573">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10574">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10574">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10575">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10575">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10576">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10576">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10577">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10577">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10578">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10578">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10579">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10579">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10580">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10580">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10581">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10581">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10582">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10582">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10583">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10583">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10584">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10584">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10585">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10585">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10586">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10586">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10587">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10587">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10588">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10588">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10589">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10589">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10590">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10590">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10591">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10591">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10592">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10592">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10593">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10593">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10594">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10594">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10595">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10595">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10596">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10597">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10597">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10598">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10599">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10600">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10600">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10601">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10601">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10602">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10602">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10603">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10603">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10604">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10604">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10605">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10605">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10606">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10606">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10607">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10607">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10608">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10608">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10609">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10609">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10610">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10610">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10611">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10611">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10612">대만 거주자 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10612">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10613">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10614">10개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10614">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10615">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10616">10개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10616">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10617">두 글자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10617">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10618">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10618">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10619">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10620">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10621">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10622">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10622">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10623">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10623">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10624">검색된 키워드가 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10624">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10625">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10625">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10626">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10626">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10627">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10627">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10628">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10628">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10629">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10629">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10630">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10630">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10631">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10631">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10632">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10632">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10633">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10633">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10634">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10634">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10635">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10635">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10636">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10636">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10637">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10637">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10638">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10638">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10639">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10640">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10640">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10642">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10642">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10643">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10643">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10644">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10644">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10645">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10648">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10648">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10649">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10649">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10650">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10650">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10651">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10651">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10652">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10652">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10653">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10654">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10654">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10657">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10657">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10658">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10658">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10661">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10661">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10662">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10663">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10663">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10665">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10665">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10666">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10667">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10667">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10669">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10670">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10670">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10671">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10671">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10672">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10673">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10673">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10674">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10674">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10675">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10675">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10676">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10676">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10677">TC Kimlik numarasas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10677">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10678">바타르다얀크 누마라소드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10678">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10679">Vatandaandaandalandak no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10679">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10680">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10680">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10681">driver's license number(운전 면허 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10681">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10682">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10682">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10683">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10684">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10684">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10686">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10686">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10687">5자리 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10687">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10688">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10688">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10689">생년월일 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자(드라이버가 여성인 경우 7번째 문자는 50으로 증가합니다. 예를 들어 01에서 12까지는 51에서 62까지 증가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10689">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10690">대소문자 구분 안 2개 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10690">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10691">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10691">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10692">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10693">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10695">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10695">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10696">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10696">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10697">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10697">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10698">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10716">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10716">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10717">electoral roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10717">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10718">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10719">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10719">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10720">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10721">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10721">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10722">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10723">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10723">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10725">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10725">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10726">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10726">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10727">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10727">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10728">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10729">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10729">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10731">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10731">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10732">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10732">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10733">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10733">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10734">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10734">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10735">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10735">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10736">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10737">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10737">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10739">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10739">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10740">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10740">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10741">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10741">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10742">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10743">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10743">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10744">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10744">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10745">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10746">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10747">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10748">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10749">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10749">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10750">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10750">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10751">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10751">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10752">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10752">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10753">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10753">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10754">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10754">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
