## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10772">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10772">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10773">NINO(national insurance number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10773">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10774">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 IDentificaiton 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10774">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10775">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10776">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10776">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10778">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10778">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10779">두 글자(유효한 NOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10779">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10780">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10780">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10781">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10781">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10782">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10782">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10783">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10783">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10784">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10784">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10785">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10785">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10786">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10786">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10787">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10787">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10788">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10788">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10789">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10789">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10790">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10790">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10791">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10791">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10792">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10793">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10793">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10795">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10795">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10796">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10796">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10797">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10797">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10798">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10798">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10799">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10799">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10821">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10821">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10822">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10822">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10823">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10824">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10825">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10826">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10827">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10828">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10829">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10830">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10830">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10832">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10832">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10833">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10834">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10834">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10835">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10836">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10837">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10837">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10838">키워드가  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10838">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10839">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10839">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10841">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10841">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10843">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10843">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10844">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10844">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10845">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10845">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10846">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10846">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10847">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10847">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10848">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10848">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10849">에서 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10849">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10850">이 열기 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10850">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10851">이 열을 호출합니다. #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10851">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10858">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10858">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10859">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10860">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10860">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10862">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10862">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10863">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10864">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10866">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성인 경우 이 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10866">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10867">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10867">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10868">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10868">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10898">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10898">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10899">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10899">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10900">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10900">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10901">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10901">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10902">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예를 들면 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10902">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10903">ddd ddd d와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10903">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10904">dddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10904">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10905">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10906">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10907">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10908">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10909">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10909">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10910">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10910">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10911">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10911">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10912">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10912">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10913">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10913">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10914">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10914">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10915">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10915">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-10916">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-10916">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11014">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11014">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11015">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11016">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자(선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식 지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11016">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11018">형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11018">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11019">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11019">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11020">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11020">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11021">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11021">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11022">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11022">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11023">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11023">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11024">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11024">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11025">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11025">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11026">폼이 없는 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11026">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11027">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11027">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11028">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11028">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11029">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11029">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11030">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11030">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11031">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11032">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11032">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11033">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11034">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11035">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11035">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11036">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11036">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11037">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11038">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11038">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11039">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11039">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11040">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11040">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11041">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11041">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11042">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11042">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11043">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11043">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11046">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11046">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11047">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11047">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11048">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11048">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11049">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11049">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11051">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11051">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11052">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11052">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11053">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11053">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11054">에서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11054">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11055">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11055">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11056">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11056">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11057">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11058">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11058">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11059">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강합니다. 여기서 숫자의 특정 부분이 유효한 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11059">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11061">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 봐야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11061">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11062">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd OR d d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11062">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11063">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자(ddd)로 서식이 지정되지 않은 2011년 전 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11063">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11064">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-d OR ddd d)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11064">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11065">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 포스터가 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11065">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11066">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11067">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11067">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11068">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11069">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 확신을 높입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11069">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11070">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11070">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11071">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11071">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11072">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11073">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11073">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11074">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11074">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11075">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보가 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11076">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11076">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11077">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11077">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11078">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11078">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11079">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11079">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11080">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11080">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11081">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11081">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11083">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11083">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11087">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11087">social security no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11089">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11089">Soc Sec</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11091">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11091">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11092">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11092">SSN#</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11095">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11095">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11096">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11096">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11097">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11097">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11098">passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11098">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11099">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11099">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11100">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11100">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11101">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11101">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11102">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11102">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11103">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11104">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11104">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11105">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11106">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11106">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11107">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11107">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11108">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11108">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11129">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11129">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11130">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11130">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11131">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11131">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11132">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11132">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11133">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11133">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11134">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11134">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11135">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11135">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11136">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11136">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11137">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11137">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11138">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11138">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11139">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11139">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11140">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11140">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11141">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11141">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11142">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11142">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11143">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11143">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11144">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11144">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11145">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11145">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11148">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11148">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11149">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11149">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11151">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11151">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11152">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11152">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11153">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11153">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11154">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11154">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11155">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11155">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11156">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11156">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11157">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11157">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11158">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11158">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11159">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11159">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11160">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11160">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11161">형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11162">8자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11162">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11163">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11164">8자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11164">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11165">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11165">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11166">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11166">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11167">체크 um</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11167">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11168">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11168">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11169">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11169">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11170">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 다음 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11171">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11171">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="e65b7-11172">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e65b7-11172">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
